sentences.sContent: They wonder if their community is no longer insulated from big city problems.
sentences.sCn: 他们想知道他们的社区是否不再与那些大城市的问题隔离。

synos.tran: 隔离，使孤立；使绝缘，使隔热

words.tran: 孤立的；与世隔绝的；海岛的；岛民的
[物] 绝缘体；从事绝缘工作的工人

trans.tranCn: 使绝缘,使绝热；隔离,孤立
trans.tranOther: to cover or protect something with a material that stops electricity, sound, heat etc from getting in or out
